Text: Shortly after the terrorist attack on the Academyâ€”
Woo! Summer break! No more school!

Let's go to the beach! Can't have summer without
the ocean!

I don't mean to rain on your parade, but the beach
isn't even open yet.

It's too bad, I wanted to spend my summer vacation
oogling cute girls in bikinis!

Bein' carefree, lettin' it all hang out...our summer
of love... Damn!

(The two of them are like the perfect extras...it's
amazing.)

Even if you go to the beach, neither of you have the
guts to even talk to a girl.

Hey, I can do it if I try! I stake it on my family's
potatoes!

...And so, this is how our first vacation as freshmen
begins. We're in high spirits and ready for anything,
butâ€”

Right now, there's something on my mind... I've got
a big problem.

Well, compared to Cid-knight-in-shining-armor-Kagenou
over there, maybe we're not much!

...There it is. My reputation has gone up too far
after that incident with Rose.

In order to use the NPC Technique, I had to get up
after Rose cut me down multiple times.

She seemed a tiny bit impressed and told me I had
guts, but I had to put it all on the line to protect
her from the terrorist.

I got a bit carried away with that perfect attack and
forgot about my reputation for a second, which
brings me to the current hostile situation.
It was just luck, y'know? It's nothiâ€”

What are you saying?! That wound is a mark of
bravery!

Owww, watch the shoulder...! It's connected to my
body, you know!

I pretend to feel pain when Po shakes me. In reality
I'm already healed, but I decide that feigning injury
is more appropriate for an extra.

Man, I wish I could've seen you carrying Rose in your
arms while getting all cut up, then slicing that terrorist
in half with your sword with the last of your strength!

My back wasn't cut...and I'd need three arms to pull
that off!

For now I brush it off like a true side character,
but the rumor is getting amplified and
embellished.

(This isn't good. I want to be seen as an extraâ€”
A normal student!)

There's a rumor goin' around saying you grew a third
arm from where they cut you!

Whoever said that is hallucinating and besides,
it wasn't even...

Even if you didn't have a third arm, it was
definitely you who saved Rose, though.
Agh...!

There were tons of students watching, so I can't make
the excuse that it was someone else.
Cid? Um, if you don't mind...

As I'm thinking about what to do, a female
classmate calls out to me.
Huh? Uh, yeah, sure...

I baked cookies in cooking class, but there were some
left over, so... I'd like you to have them.
Po's face is twitching and Skel is glaring at me.

(What should I do, if I accept then our bond as side
characters will...be fine I guess.)

(Maybe I should refuse... No, as a side character I
should swallow my pride and accept...!)

Th-Thanks! I'll take 'em! Haven't had homemade
cookies since my mom made them for me.

(How's that?! If I pretend like I'm a momma's
boy, then taking the cookies is a perfect side
character move!)

Oh? It's your first time eating someone else's
cookies? Hehe...!

(D-Damn...! I thought that would turn her off, but it
didn't work...!)

(Damn... This isn't good! I'm stuck in a vortex of
compliments!)

(No matter what I say it'll be taken as a
compliment... I'm in a vicious cycle!)
(Eventually it'll become no big deal, but...)

(The timing is awful! It's almost summer vacation.
I won't be able to use everything I've built up
until now!)

(Maybe everyone's memory of me will fade. Or maybe
they'll fantasize about it and my repuation will
skyrocket...)

(I hope it's the first option, but I want to avoid
doing nothing and have it become the second
one!)

(Okay... I need to do something so awful that anyone
who sees me will surely be revolted!)
Then I'll take one!
I eat the cookie as messily as possible.

(How's this for a baron's son?! Eating like a pig
from the trough!)
(How do I look? Like a disgusting animal, right?!)

You ate them so fast, you must have really liked my
cookies...!
Huuuuuhh?!
(Whyyy?! Why is she so positive?!)

(Ack...! Skel and Po are stabbing me with their eyes!
I can feel our bond cracking like thin ice!)

(But lowering my repuation is more important! I need
to be even grosser!)

Gah! *cough, cough* It's stuck in my throaâ€”
*cough, hack*

(How's this? I crammed it down my throat and now I'm
coughing and writhing!)
A-Are you okay?! Here, drink some water!
Ack! Sh-She's going in for a kissâ€”?!
Cid...I'm disappointed in you...

(What's with the timing?! Where did those girls
come from?)

(Skel and Po are thinking out loud! And those girls
are glaring at them!)

Hey, you guys are Skel and Po, right? Why not help
him instead of just watching?
Y'all are the worst.
C-Cid...! This is your fault!!!

In the end, the only people whose reputations went
down were Skel and Po's.

What a negative spiral...! After all, the NPC move
I've cultivated can't win out against mother nature,
right?

Wait... I can't give up so easily. It should win out
most of the time... The spice of a side character!

I need to ruin my reputation before summer break,
no matter what! Or at least get it back to how it was!
I'll show 'em what it takes to be a side character!
